programme.title: Survivor 39 - EP 10
programme.desc: Two Survivor legends mentor the newest crop of Survivor players and teach the castaways everything they know about the game on the mysterious Island of the Idols. Players of the present learn from players of the past in the hope of guaranteeing a better future for themselves.

programme.title: The Dog Who Saved Easter
programme.desc: It's up to Zeus and his new friends to save the day when Easter is nearly ruined by an old nemesis and a new one.

programme.title: Norah Jones Plays Baloise Session
programme.desc: When Norah Jones took to the world stage in 2002 with Come Away With Me, little did she guess that she would trigger a paradigm shift in pop music with her moody little disc. As a pianist her influence is jazz, but as a singer-songwriter she sits firmly in the country tradition of Hank Williams and Willie Nelson. Only the wonderful version of Cold Cold Heart on Norah Jones first album betrayed the country roots of this highly-gifted musician.

programme.desc: Dottie Doc McStuffins is an amazing six-year-old girl who has a special secret. She has the ability to talk to toys and stuffed animals. Whatever the problem, the Doc is always in, and everyone always gets better!

programme.title: Butterbean's Cafe S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: Butterbean's Cafe is set in the magical land of Puddlebrook and follows its title character, Butterbean, a young fairy who opens up and works in her own cafe, with the help of sister Cricket and friends Poppy, Dazzle, and Jasper. The patrons of the cafe consists of anthropomorphic chipmunks and rabbits. Next to the cafe is grumpy Ms. Marmalady, who plots to put Butterbean out of business, only to fail every time.

programme.desc: Hosted by popular series one MasterChef contestant, Justine Schofield. Justine believes when it comes to cooking, a little bit of confidence goes a long way, and she'll spend most of the time building up your confidence in the kitchen.

Today, she also uses her skills to help breast cancer patients document their cancer journey. 27岁的罗嘉文是个过动儿，她也患有严重的湿疹与学习障碍症。小学退学后，她留在家里接受教育。非一般的成长过程，让她受尽了别人的歧视，并且曾经萌生自杀念头。然而，摄影让她重新找到自信与人生方向。在20岁的时候她成立了婚礼摄影公司，在捕捉新人新婚喜悦之余，她也用摄影镜头去记录乳癌患者的抗癌之旅，借此提高公众对乳癌的意识。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 锁住味道 The Successor - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Madam Xie (82) inherited the skill of making Teochew Kueh from her grandmother when she was 15. Despite her age and failing eyesight, she insists on working tirelessly every day to produce handmade Kueh for her customers. Will she be able to find someone to inherit her skill and passion for Kueh? (重)新加坡人爱吃Kueh，而当中，潮州粿是大家都不陌生的Kueh！今年八十二岁的谢绍莺，在十五岁那年，从祖母身上学会了做粿的好手艺。如今虽然视力和体力已大不如前，但仍坚持每天在工作台上，准时揉好面团，备好材料，和员工一起为爱吃潮州粿的新加坡人，以手工制作充满诚意的潮州粿。这传统手艺是否能顺利传承下去呢？.

programme.title: 我们的社区饭厅 Hawkers In Our Centre - EP 2
programme.desc: With veteran hawkers retiring and few young people entering the trade, how can Singapore keep our hawker culture alive? Will we lose part of our heritage? 过去数十年，小贩们都沿街叫卖，一直到1970年代，随着国家更宏观的发展计划，新加坡的小贩才陆续搬到小贩中心里去。 现在，小贩中心以及它们所售卖的食物，已经成了新加坡人日常生活的一部分。 然而，在这座城市朝第一世界国家的愿景迈进之时，这份珍贵的遗产却很可能因为青黄不接而销声匿迹。 受过良好教育又对烹饪颇有心得的新一代小贩，有着难以磨灭的热忱。他们可以成功创业，并像小贩先辈那样，坚持守住这一份事业吗？ 小贩文化会走到尽头吗？又或者，它会继续被保留并受到珍惜？.

Some are shown singing into their headphones from their offices, etc. (重)《我想和你唱第三季》除了继续延续前两季“星素同框同台合唱"的核心节目模式，还将星素互动环节进行了升级。该节目嘉宾阵容相比前两季会更年轻化，更多90后、00后喜爱的偶像都会参与进来。节目中新增的CALLOUT环节，邀请的大来宾会亲自电话邀请三位幸运观众，请他们24小时之内赶到录制现场，获得10秒同唱机会。.

programme.title: 儿子的战争 Remember - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) Zhenyu saves Jincan from Guiwan's pursuit. In return, Jincan passes the video clips of Xiaying's rape to Zhengyu. programme.title: 新语研究所 Fun With SINGnese - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Fun with SINGnese is an infotainment series that explores the origins of local Chinese-Dialect words and how they have been passed down till now. This episode discusses how the terms Missy (nurse), Bookie (bookmaker) and Kongsi (to share) came about, and the meaning of "gang" as in Hougang. (重)《新语研究所》是富有趣味性的资讯节目，和大家轻松谈论新加坡的独特华语及方言词汇。为什么护士叫做Missy，非法接受赌注的人称为卜基？ 为什么共同分享也叫做公司？地名后港、林厝港的港指的是什么？.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Is it true that women will do anything to find their one true love? Will they be easily deceived by others in their pursuit for it? Our fellow Martians are not spared from the dangers of lust and temptation. Don't miss out this episode as Romeo Tan makes his debut on Mars vs Venus! (重)女人一有爱情，什么都可以相信？现代女人真的比较容易在感情上受骗吗？色字头上一把刀！男人始终无法抵挡诱惑！陈罗密欧首次上这个系列的节目，他会怎么看待这个课题呢？女人们会如何为自己辩护，让大家对她们改观？.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai finds out that the real culprit is her immediate supervisor, Jifeng. programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 5

programme.title: Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 2

When Louis receives news that his grandmother has been warded due to high fever, he rushes back to Korea to visit his only kin in the world. She wants to look for her brother Funan who is studying there. While looking for Funan, she runs into Louis who has become a homeless person after suffering amnesia... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)原本与奶奶生活，远离文明世界的村姑福实因奶奶突然去世，便只身去都市寻她那在城市首尔上学的弟弟福南，要与他相依为命。福实在街上寻找弟弟福南时，发现了意外患上失忆症，变成露宿者的路易......

Let's follow fixer to the forest to track down illegal loggers and learn about illegal logging. (重)(大结局)巴拉望岛是潜水和浮潜的乐园，也是菲律宾最后一块生态净土，因为经济利益的关系，环保意识的不普及，将森林视为摇钱树，非法砍伐活动猖獗。让我们跟随线人走进森林，追踪非法伐木者, 了解当地非法砍伐的问题。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 4

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 9
programme.desc: Every year, 6 out of 10 Philippinos whom died from illness, are still denied of medical attention at their deathbeds. Jojo Goh travels to Philippines, an isolated and typhoon-prone Sabtang island with less than 2000 villagers. She discovers the many hats worn by the only doctor serving there. 每10名菲律宾人病死当中，仍有6人临死前无法得到医疗照顾。主持人吴俐璇千里迢迢到与世隔绝的沙坦岛，拜访在孤岛下乡行医的年轻医生，了解他如何在资源匮乏的环境下，只身照顾将近2000名岛民。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 21
programme.desc: Wuzhou is attacked by Secretary Jin when he gets ready to leave the country. Guangdong dies when he tries to protect Wuzhou. Wuzhou realises that he has been betrayed by Wenshu once again and decides to testify in court. (PG13-暴力镜头)(双声道-中/韩)五洲准备离开韩国却被已经被文淑收买的金秘书攻击。冠东为了保护五洲结果被金秘书刺死。五洲发现自己再次被文淑出卖， 终于决定出庭作证。.

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Every year, 6 out of 10 Philippinos whom died from illness, are still denied of medical attention at their deathbeds. Jojo Goh travels to Philippines, an isolated and typhoon-prone Sabtang island with less than 2000 villagers. She discovers the many hats worn by the only doctor serving there. (重)每10名菲律宾人病死当中，仍有6人临死前无法得到医疗照顾。主持人吴俐璇千里迢迢到与世隔绝的沙坦岛，拜访在孤岛下乡行医的年轻医生，了解他如何在资源匮乏的环境下，只身照顾将近2000名岛民。.

programme.title: Shopaholic Louis - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Louis's grandmother thinks Louis has been killed in an accident. She is depressed and wants to move back to Busan live out the rest of her life there. She leaves the Golden Enterprise in the hands of Shanben, which suits the cunning Shenban well. Zhongyuan's mother tells her husband she will arrange a blind date for their son again as he still does not have a girlfriend. Fushi sees the granny who stole her bag on the train last time. She chases after the granny with Louis to get back her bag. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)路易的奶奶因以为路易因车祸去世，伤心地要回釜山住，在那里渡过余生，并把公司黄金集团交给善本打理，这正合了狡猾的善本的心意。中元的母亲见儿子还没有女朋友，便跟老公讲她要替儿子再安排相亲。福实见到上次在火车上偷她包包的奶奶，连忙与路易去追那奶奶要回她的包包。.

programme.title: Shopaholic Louis - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Zhongyuan pushes Fushi in a dispute. Fushi falls and faints. Zhongyuan feels guilty and rushes Fushi to the hospital. When Fushi wakes up, Zhongyuan pays Fushi for the wild ginseng and offers her a job at the product planning department. Fushi and Louis shop for daily necessities and clothes at the market when Fushi has the money. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)福实与中元起争执之时，中元推了福实一下，福实倒地就昏过去了。中元感到内疚，急忙送福实去医院。中元在福实醒来后还了她山参的钱又给了她工作，叫她到商品企划室上班 !福实手上有了点钱，与路易去市场为新屋添日常生活用品和购买一些衣物。.

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Barcelona, Spain. A city that celebrates the arts. Every corner is coloured with passion and originality. The city attracts many people who wish to pursue their artistic aspirations. These artists have made much quiet sacrifices. On this path to success, what trials do they go through? (重)拥有两千年历史的巴塞罗那，是西班牙的艺术重镇，每一个角落都充满了色彩、激情和创意,吸引不少追求艺术梦想的人到那里生活。为了追求艺术，离乡背井的艺术家，有太多不为人知的付出和牺牲。在功成名就以前，他们到底需要克服多少离愁？承受多少寂寞呢？.

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The topics of this episode is soy sauce and vinegar. Vinegar is produced from grains in the East, from fruits and wine in the West. Soy sauce is derived from sauce. Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak introduce the history, production and ways of usage of Italian and French vinegar and soy sauce in Asia. (重)这一集的节目主题是酱油和醋。东方以谷物酿造醋，而西方却是以水果和葡萄酒酿醋。酱油则是由酱演变而来。郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak会为我们介绍亚洲和东南亚各地的酱油，意大利和法国醋的历史，制作和用法。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Hengshun ignores Caili. Caili thus goes to the pub to spite Hengshun. Caili meets the real Shen Zaimin at the pub. Zaimin develops a liking for Caili and wants Hengshun to break up with Caili as soon as possible. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)亨顺不理会采莉，采莉为了激怒亨顺，于是负气地到夜店去。采莉在夜店碰到真正的申在民。在民跟采莉接触后，很喜欢她，催亨顺早日跟采莉分手。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Huaxing gets spotted by the SBC news anchor Huiyan while he is looking for Nali. He lies to her that he is warded for dengue fever and starts to criticize her viciously on her newscasting. Xiaohong receives a call that her father is critically ill when she is having class, so she wants to rush to the hospital immediately. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)华信从病房出来找娜丽时被SBC的女主播惠媛看到了。华信向她谎称自己住院是身患登革热，随后开始毒舌地批评她的新闻报道。在学校上课的小红接到电话，得知自己的父亲病危意欲赶往医院。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 5
programme.desc: Ting-en returns to Korea, but is locked out of her house. She thus resorts to sleeping at a construction site. Xianyu attempts to chase Ting-en out of the construction site, but gets beaten by Ting-en instead. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)廷恩回到韩国，本来想回家，却不得入门，于是在正在施工的大楼打地铺。贤宇想把廷恩赶走，结果被当成是色狼，被廷恩打了一顿。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 6
programme.desc: Tongxi is almost molested. Guifen finally agrees to move in with the Hans out of consideration for Tongxi's safety. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)彤熙差点儿被人非礼。贵芬担心彤熙的安全，觉得长期住在汗蒸幕不是办法，终于答应搬到韩家去住。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 4
programme.desc: In India, 400 women and children go missing every day, with many of those missing girls being trafficked for commercial sexual exploitation. After being rescued, the victims still have to face discrimination while their perpetrators go unpunished. 印度每天有400名妇孺人间蒸发。其中有好些是被人口贩卖份子推入火炕的少女。当失踪少女获救后，她们仍然得面对邻里的歧视。肇事者事后，却逍遥法外。.

programme.title: 武法律師 Lawless Lawyer - EP 22
programme.desc: Wenshu is unable to deny her wrongdoings anymore when Shunzi, Wuzhou and Xianzhu take the stand in court one by one to testify against her. Wenshu is sentenced to life imprisonment. Wuzhou takes his own life as he is not willing to stand trial for his crimes. (PG13-暴力镜头)(大结局)(双声道-中/韩)顺子、五洲和贤珠的证词令文淑无法继续逍遥法外。文淑被判无期徒刑。五洲自己也是罪犯，但因为不愿意接受审判，最终选择自我了结。.

programme.title: Shopaholic Louis - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Rencheng takes Louis to the market. Louis sees a penguin musical box at the flea market and seems to recall something. He has a headache and Rencheng quickly takes him home. Meanwhile in Busan, Louis's grandmother is looking at the sea, which Louis loved. She talks to housekeeper Jin Haojun about what happened when Louis was a kid and feels a little sentimental. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)仁成带路易去市场逛逛。路易在旧货市场看到了企鹅音盒，似乎想起了什么 ,他的头突然痛了起来，仁成赶快送他回家。另一边，路易的奶奶在釜山看着路易喜欢的海，与金浩俊管家谈起了路易小时的情景，有点感伤。.

programme.title: Shopaholic Louis - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Zhongyuan knows Fushi is very upset about Mary stealing her idea for the new product. He gives Fushi a pair of new shoes to cheer her up. Fushi falls ill and Louis takes good care of her. Their relationship warms up. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)中元知福实因玛丽盗用了她的新产品构思点子很伤心，便送了一双新鞋给福实为她打气。福实病了，路易细心照顾，两人感情逐渐升温。.

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 加文纳桥的约定 Love At Cavenagh Bridge - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Every year, on this day, scriptwriter Han Liang and rich married woman Lina would put down all their family and work commitments, and meet each other on Cavenagh Bridge. This special day is the anniversary of the day they first met That fateful year, Han Liang was at the lowest point of his career, and Lina was distraught by her husband's betrayal. They were at the bridge to end their lives when they met each other, and somehow helped each other find a reason to live on. (PG)(重)每一年的这一天，编剧汉良和富太莉娜都会放下工作，放下家庭，放下所有重要事情，风雨不改来到加纹纳桥上“幽会"。原来这一天是两人多年前的“相逢纪念日"……那一年，失意的编剧碰上被老公劈腿的贵妇，两人本来生无可恋，却在自杀前互相鼓励，互相扶持，竟然一起度过难关，走出阴霾。逐渐地，两人的关系已经升华得比自己枕边人更重要的地位。两人发乎情却止于礼，可是这算不算是一种精神出轨呢？.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Junying has a show-down with Hengkui when he obtains evidence of Hengkui meeting Zhiyan secretly. At the same time, Shanyu appears at the office to deliver cakes to Junying. Junying insults Hengkui in front of Shanyu. Shanyu sides with Hengkui even though she knows he is in the wrong. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)俊英搜集到亨奎跟智妍幽会的证据，在办公室跟亨奎摊牌。同一时间，珊玉上门送糕点给俊英。俊英将亨奎勾搭智妍及恩将仇报的事告诉珊玉，当着珊玉的面羞辱亨奎。珊玉明知亨奎有错在先，却袒护亨奎，对俊英破口大骂，还推俊英。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Nali is in charge of the weather forecast for the morning news. Zhengyuan sacrifices his sleep to fetch her to work. Nali is both surprised and touched. Nali goes to the hospital for medical review. The doctor tells her that Huaxing has not come for any checkup nor breast cancer radiation therapy. This makes Nali very worried. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)娜丽负责晨早新闻的气象环节，正元特地牺牲睡眠，在清早亲自送她上班，让她即惊奇又感动。娜丽来到医院复查，医生告诉她华信一次都没来检查过，也没有做过乳癌放射治疗，让娜丽十分担心。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 7
programme.desc: Xianyu reports Ting-en to the police when he suspects her to have stolen from the construction site. Ting-en remembers seeing a truck driver on the day of the incident and successfully assists the police in nabbing the real thief. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)工地的施工材料被偷，贤宇怀疑是廷恩所为，于是报警捉她。廷恩有过人的记忆力，记得事发当天有一名货车司机开着货车进出工地，成功协助警方破案。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 8
programme.desc: Ting-en recognizes Xianyu as the bigwig who helped her out in the U.S. three years ago. Xianyu worries about how he can continue to keep his identity under wraps. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)廷恩认出贤宇就是三年前曾经帮助过她的黄金街代表。贤宇思考如何继续隐瞒他的身份。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 8
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 1
programme.desc: Han Taizhu, a detective with principles, loses consciousness after getting hit by a car while pursuing a serial killer suspect. When he wakes up, he finds himself in the year 1988. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(首播)(双声道-中/韩)韩泰柱在追捕犯人时被一辆车撞倒，在他醒来后却发现自己竟然穿越回到1988年。.

programme.title: Shopaholic Louis - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Zhongyuan finds out that Louis is staying at Fushi's house and feels jealous. He keeps persuading Louis to move to the house he has arranged for him. However, Louis is unmoved. Rencheng tells Louis that Zhongyuan likes Fushi, hoping to get Louis to move out from Fushi's house. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)中元得知路易寄居福实家，醋意大发，不断说服路易搬到他安排的家居住，可路易一点也没有动摇。仁成告诉路易中元喜欢福实, 目的是要他立刻搬离福实家。.

programme.title: Shopaholic Louis - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Louis wants to celebrate Fushi's job contract extension for another year. He shops freely with Fushi's credit card. Fushi chases him out of the house angrily. She wants him to return the goods or else will not let him stay with her anymore... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)路易为了庆祝福实的工作合约期延长一年的好消息，又用福实的信用卡乱买东西。福实十分生气地将他赶出门外要他去退货，不然就不让他住在她家......

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. (重)本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。.

programme.title: 巾帼女将 Women Warriors - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) In Kaohsiung, Paige meets Ya Qing, a female fire-fighter and joins in their rescue drill. Heavily supped up in fire-proof gear and navigating her way around without the benefit of vision, Paige realizes the grit Ya Qing possesses. (重)巾帼女将是一个表扬21世纪女性的节目。这系列一一列出所有有关女性种种美妙和美好的一面，从受访者轻松女性化的追逐到激烈行为的工作经历。每一集，绮慧将了解在地受访者以什么工作谋生。同时，在激烈的工作和训练中，她也了解受访者如何享受社交和家庭生活。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Nadia comes clean with Mei Qi and tells her she knows that the latter is now the "True Liar" and persuades her to change her ways as the price to pay will be too great. Mei Qi confesses that all she wanted to do was to seek revenge on Nadia and Nadia apologizes to Mei Qi repeatedly for her mistake in the past. She goes on to tell Mei Qi her deepest secret; that she was the original "True Liar"... (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)Nadia对美琪坦白，知道她是大话精，劝她悬崖勒马，因为代价太大！美琪露出真实面目，表明要对Nadia报复泄恨，Nadia对妹妹忏悔，说了隐藏多年的秘密，原来Nadia是第一个大话精，妹妹会被拐走，是因为她撒谎的代价。.

programme.desc: (R) In India, 400 women and children go missing every day, with many of those missing girls being trafficked for commercial sexual exploitation. programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 2

(重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.
